resources.string: Hydraulica is a very simple App that illustrates the use of Navigation Toolbar. It includes four Activities named as Calculate Force, Add Supplier, About Activity, Contact Us information. Hydraulica is a very user friendly Mobile APP developed for Smarthphones and Tablets that allows for the calculation of Cylinder Force.Developed in the latest version of Android using Jet Pack or API Level 30 (v30). It is available in both Java and Kotlin versions.Making use of the NavigationDrawer, ActionBar and FAB to allow for very user intuitive navigation.
